chapters.title: Chapter 1: Fanning the Sparks
chapters.info: High Lady Alteima, p. 67 (49)—High Lady of Tear with black hair. She knows how pretty she is and how to use that fact to get what she wants from men. She comes to see Morgase after fleeing Tear in hope that the Queen will be able to restore her to some of her influence she held in Tear in her new home, Caemlyn. She tried to poison her husband, Tedosian, but did not succeed in killing him. See also Tedosian.
